src/newtonERP/viewers/secondStep/SearchBarViewer.java

00001 package newtonERP.viewers.secondStep;
00002 
00003 import newtonERP.viewers.viewerData.SearchBar;
00004 
00009 public class SearchBarViewer
00010 {
00015         public static String getHtmlCode(SearchBar searchBar)
00016         {
00017                 String html = "";
00018 
00019                 String searchEntry = searchBar.getCurrentSearchEntry();
00020                 if (searchEntry == null)
00021                         searchEntry = "";
00022 
00023                 html += "<form method='get' action='" + searchBar.getTargetUrl() + "'>";
00024                 html += "<div class='searchBar'>";
00025                 html += "Rercherche: <input type='text' class='textField' maxlength='128' size='48' name='searchEntry' value='"
00026                                 + searchEntry + "' />";
00027 
00028                 html += " | ordre: <select name='orderBy'>";
00029 
00030                 if (searchBar.getCurrentOrder() != null
00031                                 && searchBar.getCurrentOrder().length() > 0)
00032                         html += "<option value='" + searchBar.getCurrentOrder() + "'>"
00033                                         + searchBar.getCurrentOrder() + "</option>";
00034 
00035                 for (String possibleOrderName : searchBar.getPossibleOrderNameList())
00036                         if (!possibleOrderName.equals(searchBar.getCurrentOrder()))
00037                                 html += "<option value='" + possibleOrderName + "'>"
00038                                                 + possibleOrderName + "</option>";
00039                 html += "</select> ";
00040 
00041                 if (searchBar.getOffset() != 0)
00042                         html += "<input type='hidden' name='offset' value='"
00043                                         + searchBar.getOffset() + "' />";
00044 
00045                 if (searchBar.getLimit() != 0)
00046                         html += "<input type='hidden' name='limit' value='"
00047                                         + searchBar.getLimit() + "' />";
00048 
00049                 html += "<input type='submit' value='Go' />";
00050                 html += "</div>";
00051                 html += "</form>";
00052 
00053                 return html;
00054         }
00055 }
